alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Hamilton; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 7:45PM CDT until July 04 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Finney County in southwestern Kansas... Northern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 830 PM CDT/730 PM MDT/. * At 744 PM CDT/644 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Lakin to near Kendall, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakin, Holcomb, Deerfield and Garden City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
